query: SELECT current_status, planning_district, date_trunc_ym(approved_date_planning) AS month, SUM(new_pipeline_units) AS total_new_units WHERE approved_date_planning >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY current_status, planning_district, month ORDER BY month, planning_district, current_status

current_status.description: Most recent or current development pipeline project status

planning_district.description: Planning District in which the project is located

approved_date_planning.description: Project received approval from authoring agency but not necessary entitlement from the Planning Commission

new_pipeline_units.description: A project's new gross units that is still in the pipeline; i.e., hasn't yet received a TCO/CFC (proposed units-existing units + demolition units - TCO units)

table_metadata.title: San Francisco Development Pipeline
table_metadata.description: Snapshot of San Francisco's Development Pipeline as of the end of 2024 Q3. This dataset combines projects data from the City Planning Department and permit data from the Building Inspection Department to create a quarterly snapshot of construction and entitlement activity.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: City planners, real estate developers, policy makers, researchers in urban development.

whom_it_may_interest: City planners, real estate developers, policy makers, researchers in urban planning and housing.
title: San Francisco Development Pipeline
